mapper.select:
select bno,title,bdate,bcount, writer,content,blike,bhate,comment_count from (select ceil(rownum / 7) as pagenum,bno,title,bdate,bcount, writer,content,blike,bhate,comment_count from (select b.*, nvl(c.comment_count,0) as comment_count from board b, (select bno, count(*) as comment_count from board_comment group by bno) c where b.bno = c.bno(+)
order by b.blike desc))
order by b.bhate desc))
order by b.bno desc))
where pagenum = #{pageNo}
mapper.update: update board set bcount = bcount+1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment(cno, bno, writer, content) values(board_comment_seq.nextval,#{bno},#{writer},#{content})
mapper.update: update board_comment set blike = blike + 1 where cno = #{cno}
update board_comment set bhate = bhate+ 1 where cno = #{cno}

update board set
blike = blike + 1
bhate = bhate + 1
where bno = #{bno}
